p: 9-Chlorolumichrome ( 1): Crystalline yellowish solid (monoclinic, isopropanol); UV (MeOH) λ max (log ε) 221 (4.49) nm, 252 (4.44) nm, 267 (4.50) nm, 349 (3.97) nm, 391 (3.82) nm; IR (ATR Diamond) ν max 3709, 3691, 3648, 3606, 2360, 2341, 2273 cm −1; For 1H and 13C NMR data see Table 1; HRESIMS m/ z 275.0356 [M-H] − (Calcd. for C 12H 8N 4O 2 35Cl, 275.0336).
